title: Caught Offside: IMPORTANT SHOW ANNOUNCEMENT
description:
The boys say goodbye to ESPN but hello to bringing you even more soccer content in the years to come! For the time being, you can find new episodes here https://spoti.fi/3RT6u1z at Spotify with all other podcast platforms soon to follow. Keep checking @COsoccerpod on Twitter for additional updates.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
